name: spill the beans chapter 1 - 5
description:
this is a game series i'm making on scratch called spill the beans; when you either complete or fail a mode just press the green flag to restart.

The ants are trying to take over the world and bleb needs to stop them but he can't do it alone, he needs your help to defeat the ants and their ressurected god; EXCALIVANCE: THE ANT GOD OF DESTRUCTION, CONQUEROR OF WORLDS, LITERAL GOD. luckily however, blebs entire species has the ability to launch magic beans that can defeat the ants (until they get back up and try again)

this is only chapter 1 so far, chapter 2 - 5 will be added later as they get fully updated on scratch

the music is different in the scratch version compared to this version

all the music was made (partially) by me and (mostly) an ai
